titleStmt.title: Philosophia theologiæ ancillans hoc est, pia & sobria explicatio quæstionum philosophicarum in disputationibus theologicis subinde occurrentium. Auctore Roberto Baronio ...
titleStmt.author: Baron, Robert, 1593?-1639.

notesStmt.note: At foot of title: Cum priuilegio.
Signatures: [par.] chi⁴ A-E (E4 + ² chi⁴, -² chi4) F-L (L2 + ³chi⁴) M-X (X7 + ² chi4).
With a final errata leaf; the last leaf is blank.
